comment: Alekhine's defence with reversed colours against Alekhine! Reti never repeated this experiment.

comment: Taking the pawn is always bad because 17. Bxh3 Qxh3 18. Nxb72 Ng4 19. Nf3 Nde3 $3 20. Fxe3 Nxe3 21. Qxf7+ Kh8! 22. Nh4 Rf8 and threat on 'f1' is deadly.
